Apple.name: Apple
Apple.description: A sweet and crunchy fruit, often red, green, or yellow in color, grown in many parts of the world.

Banana.name: Banana
Banana.description: A tropical fruit with a yellow peel and soft, sweet flesh.

Melon.name: Melon
Melon.description: A sweet and juicy fruit with a green rind and typically a pink or orange flesh.

Lemon.name: Lemon
Lemon.description: A sour and tart fruit, often yellow in color, used for its juice and peel.
